_comment: Created by EFisher on 24/01/2014 17:02:17 using v2.0
title: How has life expectancy changed by country?
analysis_commentary: The graph compares rates for the UK with selected other countries over the last 30 year. The life expectancy has increased in all countries over this time period with the UK's life expectancy having increased by 7.3 years from 73.8 in 1981 to 81.1 in 2011. However, despite this increase in 2011 the UK still had an absolute life expectancy lower than Australia and France, but it was higher than in the United States.
data_source: Office for National Statistics, Health Data 2013
